xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/312715-ABC News Presents: Pope John Paul II: His Life and Legacy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The intriguing life of Pope John Paul II is profiled in this comprehensive documentary that paints a thorough portrait of the man so many Catholics look to for guidance, healing and strength. His courage and resolve as a leader have put him at the forefront of a religion often caught up in controversy. Narrated by Bill Blakemore, this release also includes the Pope's unique 2003 appearance on television's "Good Morning America." ABC News Presents: Pope John Paul II: His Life and Legacy
